title: Queen Elizabeth I
subtle:
Biography (nonfiction), 2,183 words, Level Z2 (Grade 5+), Lexile 1060L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     Q and Z
description: When Queen Elizabeth I took the throne, England was a country in decline. Her adept leadership turned the country around and brought almost unprecedented prosperity. Learn about how this amazing woman ushered in a "Golden Age" in this fascinating book.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
